mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stadiums(stadiumName, teamsId, createdAt) VALUES(#{stadiumName}, #{teamsId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.stadiumName, t.teamName, s.createdAt FROM stadiums s LEFT OUTER JOIN teams t ON s.teamsId = t.id
SELECT s.id, s.stadiumName, t.teamName, s.createdAt FROM stadiums s LEFT OUTER JOIN teams t ON s.teamsId = t.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
